snippet.title: Exodus Game Play - Part 1 Desert
snippet.description:
store.steampowered.com/app/2526860/Exodus  only steam 0.99$



Brief game play, cross the desert to the pyramid door, so you can learn some of the game's mechanics. These areas were not 100% explored, only following the logical route.
